resources.string: A place which gives wings to your dreamsðŸ’« Pehli Manzil has given a platform to students in pithoragarh where they can learn, improve and achieve their goals. It was difficult for the students earlier as they had to move to big cities for coaching. But Pehli Manzil has provided a platform near home, which is worth it. Teachers here are well qualified. And the most important thing is the environment here, its very healthy and full of motivation

The department has well qualified and dedicated faculty. The faculty of the department covers a wide range of Mechanical and Industrial engineering areas such as Applied Mechanics & design, Dynamic & Control, Thermo fluid & Processes, Materials & Manufacturing, Production Planning & Control, Automation etc. Our graduates are working in Multinational Companies, Defence services, and Academic institutions in India and Abroad. Last but not least our technical supporting staff is unique in its way. Students, as well as visitors, find them very friendly, polite and highly intelligent.
I wish all the students and faculty a great academic career. Thank you for visiting us.

In computer science you will study and apply your knowledge in understanding what computers are, as how to program them, tools to write a program, the rules when converting the written program understandable by the computers, the interface between the computer and the user, the computer graphics, computer networking, managing the software database, software engineering and testing them efficiently and more. The Department also places emphasis on all the important aspects of computers such as High speed networks, Soft Computing, Algorithm Design, Network Security, Advance database systems, Theory of computation and many more. The Department also takes initiative to improve the soft skills, analytical capabilities and verbal communication of the students so that they can face the competition in the corporate world confidently.

Best coaching institute for preparation of competitive exams and for overall development of Students in Pithoragarh. Faculties have in depth knowledge of their subjects and having good teaching methodology with result oriented approach. Along with subject coverage,well designed practice sets, mock tests are also provided which will boost your preparation level up. Institute have provided very good results in last few years.. specially in defence field. Many more to come âœ¨ # Pehli Manzil # Faith in the name.
Link Road near Lead Bank Pithoragarh, Uttarakhand 262501 India
